ValidationRule.description: Account is required when raising a case for Type = Warranty / Shipping Error
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( $Setup.Bypass_Configuration__c.Account_Validation_Rule__c= FALSE, RecordType.DeveloperName = 'General', OR ( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Warranty Support') , ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Shipping Error') ), OR( ISBLANK( AccountId ), ISBLANK(TEXT( Product_Type__c )) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account and Product Type should be filled if Case Type is Warranty Support OR Shipping Error.
